faqs.question: Q 1 Is Jain food available in BBQ nation?
faqs.answer: ResponseYes, surely assist with information, can I know no. of pax looking for Jain food, is that you’re looking for lunch or dinner. According to the information given by guest, Yes we have Jain food available but variety will be limited and once you reach to outlet you should inform to outlet team on Jain food , shall I proceed for reservation Tagging Enquiry - Menu & Drinks

faqs.question: Q 2 Does Barbeque Nation serve Halal food?
faqs.answer: ResponseSir/Mam, Y es we serv e Halal food (Meat) in all the barbeque nation outlets. TaggingEnquiry - Menu & Drinks

faqs.question: Q 3 Do you have any proof / Certificate for Halal?
faqs.answer: ResponseMam/Sir , We do ha ve certificate in all the barbeque nation outlets. TaggingEnquiry - Menu & Drinks

faqs.question: Q 4 What is the menu for today?
faqs.answer: ResponseSurely Mam/Sir , I will assist with information:- Inform the menu as per altius / Menu details in KP TaggingEnquiry - Menu & Drinks

faqs.question: Q 5 Is outside Alcoholic drink allowed in Barbeque Nation outlet?
faqs.answer: Response Mam/Sir , I'm sorry to inform outside drinks are not allowed in Barbeque Nation. Howev er we serv e drinks in barbeque nation as per ala carte menu TaggingEnquiry - Menu & Drinks5/12/25, 2:19 PM Menu and Drinks : Barbeque Nation https://barbequenation.freshservice.com/support/solutions/articles/27000024770-Menu-and-Drinks 1/4

faqs.question: Q 6 Can I get the drinks details through mail?
faqs.answer: ResponseYes mam/sir , (1.) I would request y ou to download barbeque nation app and click on menu, y ou can view the drinks menu (2.)Please pro vide y our mail ID , we will send drinks details Tagging Enquiry - Menu & Drinks

faqs.question: Q 7 Does Barbeque nation have ala carte menu for food?
faqs.answer: ResponseMam/Sir , for dine-in services we serve unlimited buf fet.  Ala carte menu is available only for takeaway and delivery services Tagging Enquiry - Menu & Drinks

faqs.question: Can I customize the menu?
faqs.answer: ResponseMam/Sir , if you want any change in menu like taste , spicy or less spicy changes can be made. But if you want additional dish apart from menu need to check with branch as per availability you will get. Tagging Enquiry - Menu & Drinks

faqs.question: Q 9 Does Menu remain same for all the outlets?
faqs.answer: Response Yes,mam/sir menu is standard across all branches of barbeque nation Tagging Enquiry - Menu & Drinks

faqs.question: Q 10 What type of fish do Barbeque nation serve?
faqs.answer: Response Mam/Sir, We serve BASA fish which is boneless fish Tagging Enquiry - Menu & Drinks

faqs.question: Q 11What type of prawns do barbeque nation serve?
faqs.answer: Response Mam/Sir, we serve Medium size prawns which is called as Zinga prawns Tagging Enquiry - Menu & Drinks

faqs.question: Will I get mutton briyani?
